casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Ronald Cabral (13728)

Dupont, C. J., and Foti and Lavery, Js.

Argued May 22 decision released June 27, 1995 *910William T. Koch, Jr., for the appellant (defendant). Lisa Herskowitz, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Kevin T. Kane, state’s attorney, and Geoffrey E. Marion, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
